snippet.title: Review: Vera Drake
snippet.description: Tender, quality presentation of touchy subject.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Joshua
snippet.description: Sinister sibling-rivalry drama is majorly creepy.

snippet.title: Recipes to Keep You Glowing and Growing
snippet.description: 'Goddess archetypes live within every woman,' says Hailey D.D. Klein, author of 'For Goddess' Sake: Get the Girls Together and Have Some Fun' (Conari Press). In her book, Klein helps women access these goddesses and let...

snippet.title: Film Review: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
snippet.description: Holocaust drama sensitive, but never sentimental.

snippet.title: DVD Review: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
snippet.description: Holocaust drama sensitive, but never sentimental.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Orphan
snippet.description: Bad Seed-style horror movie is gory and ludicrous.

snippet.title: Video/DVD Review: Up in the Air
snippet.description: Adult dramedy taps into emotions of current tough times.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Source Code
snippet.description: Taut thriller delivers explosive images, sci-fi twists.

snippet.title: Movie Review: Henry's Crime
snippet.description: Aside from language, so-so caper comedy is fine for teens.

snippet.title: Healthy Lunch Ideas Your Kids Will Love
snippet.description: A recent report indicates that more and more children are overweight. Obesity in children has risen to 14 percent compared with 4 percent in 1963. Here are some healthy lunch ideas to keep your kids in tip top shape!
